thread.title: Jamal Udeen's wife says Syria was 'not her cup of tea' | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Jamal Udeen's wife says Syria was 'not her cup of tea' | Daily Mail Online

author: Jay Akbar For Mailonline
title: Jamal Udeen's wife says Syria was 'not her cup of tea' | Daily Mail Online
text: 'ISIS girls are like gangsters... They are so violent!' Law graduate who married grinning jihadi claimed she fled Syria with five children because it was 'not her cup of tea' British terrorist Jamal Udeen al-Harith blew himself up in Mosul, Iraq, this week His wife Shukee Begum took their five children and followed him to Syria in 2014 She claimed she traveled to ISIS territory to convince Udeen, 50, to come home Begum pleaded for help to come home, saying that Syria was 'not her cup of tea' She revealed how 'single women' huddled around a laptop to watch ISIS videos
